text:
There will be no power supply between 9 a.m. and 5 p.m. on Tuesday in the following areas of Thanjavur district served by the Manimandapam sub station due to regular maintenance work: Arulananda Nagar, Yagappa Nagar, Arulananda Ammal Nagar, Pudukkottai Road, VOC Nagar, Nirmala Nagar, Mary's Corner, Nanjikkottai Road, Anna Nagar, Fathima Nagar, Shanthi Nagar, Pookkara Street, Gorikulam, Periyar Nagar, Indira Nagar, Ezhil Nagar, Natarajapuram South, TPS Nagar, Mangalapuram, Kannan Nagar, Balaji Nagar, JJ Nagar, Pon Nagar, LIC Colony and neighbouring areas.

Thiruvenkadu

There will be no power supply in the following areas served by the Thiruvenkadu sub station between 9 a.m. and 5 p.m. on Tuesday: Thiruvenkadu, Melaiyur, Manigramanm, Poompuhar, Perunthottam, Thiruvali, Thirunagari, Thirunangoor, Keezhasalai, Melasalai, Mangaimadam, Annanperumal Koil and surrounding areas, according to a TANGEDCO press release.
title: Power shutdown today
